/* Code.ListCode */
WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( SELECT CODE_ID, UP_CODE_ID, CODE_VALUE, CODE_NAME, CODE_CONTENT, CODE_ORDER, CAST(CODE_ORDER AS CHAR(200)) AS SORT_ORDER, USE_YN, DELETE_YN FROM CO_CODE WHERE UP_CODE_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT A.CODE_ID, A.UP_CODE_ID, A.CODE_VALUE, A.CODE_NAME, A.CODE_CONTENT, A.CODE_ORDER, CONCAT(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', LPAD(A.CODE_ORDER, 5, '0')) AS SORT_ORDER, A.USE_YN, A.DELETE_YN FROM CO_CODE A INNER JOIN R ON A.UP_CODE_ID = R.CODE_ID ) SELECT R.CODE_ID, R.UP_CODE_ID, R.CODE_VALUE, R.CODE_NAME, R.CODE_CONTENT, R.CODE_ORDER, R.USE_YN, R.DELETE_YN FROM R ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', 1) AS UNSIGNED), CASE WHEN R.SORT_ORDER LIKE '%-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END
